EmailTemplate.name: LH Auto Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: We'll Be in Touch Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Lighthouse
For Support, Call 855-888-6474
Hello,
Thank you for contacting Lighthouse Support! We received your message and look forward to assisting you as soon as possible.
If you need more immediate assistance, you are welcome to call us at (855) 888-6474 with your reference number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. We’re here Monday through Friday, from 8am to 7pm EST.
Thank you for choosing Lighthouse, we appreciate your business!
